description:
Get full access to your brifters without exposing your hands to icy winter winds. Wrapping around your upper drop bars, hoods, and controls, the Draugenklaw Pogies keep your hands warm and let you brake and shift like you would without the pogies. Whether you’re heading out for a sub-zero training ride, a snowy gravel grind, or you’re just a dedicated cycle commuter, these pogies protect your hands from less than stellar weather.

  • Softshell material blocks wind and light rain
  • Soft fleecy interior traps warmth and wicks away moisture
  • Compact design and hook-and-loop attachment makes it easy to keep your pogies in a pannier and take them on and off as needed
  • 45NRTH recommends these pogies for temperatures between 2 and -9°C
  • Reflective details help keep you seen
  • Compatible with normal and most flared drop bars
  • To determine whether this pogie will fit your bars, measure from the forward-most tip of the hood to the back of the top section of the handlebar. If this measurement is 6.5” (165 mm) or less, the pogie should fit properly
name: 45NRTH Draugenklaw Drop Bar Pogies - Unisex
